hyperparameters.name: multi_class
hyperparameters.short_desc: Specifies how multi-class classification problems are handled. Supported are 'one_vs_rest' and 'one_vs_one'. In 'one_vs_rest', one binary Gaussian process classifier is fitted for each class, which is trained to separate this class from the rest. In 'one_vs_one', one binary Gaussian process classifier is fitted for each pair of classes, which is trained to separate these two classes.
